title: Mr. Magorium's Wonder Emporium
plot: The young apprentice of a magical, eccentric toy store owner learns to believe in herself, and in her friends, upon learning some grave news about the future.
stars: Natalie Portman, Dustin Hoffman, Jason Bateman
